channel.title: CVE Feed for gVectors Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gVectors Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-38055|2024-06-21T15:52:09.888Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in gVectors Team wpForo Forum allows Content Spoofing.This issue affects wpForo Forum: from n/a through 2.0.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-35681|2024-06-10T17:39:56.784Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpdiscuz
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in gVectors Team wpDiscuz allows Stored XSS.This issue affects wpDiscuz: from n/a through 7.6.18.

item.title: CVE-2023-51691|2024-02-01T10:57:47.199Z -- gvectors%20team -- comments%20%E2%80%93%20wpdiscuz
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in gVectors Team Comments – wpDiscuz allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Comments – wpDiscuz: from n/a through 7.6.12.

item.title: CVE-2023-46310|2024-06-04T17:22:09.696Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpdiscuz
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in gVectors Team wpDiscuz allows Code Injection.This issue affects wpDiscuz: from n/a through 7.6.10.
